item.title: AnyParser
item.description: AnyParser is an API platform by CambioML that uses vision-language models to parse unstructured documents into structured formats for AI and RAG applications.

item.title: Chunkr
item.description: Chunkr is an open-source document processing API by Lumina AI that transforms complex documents into RAG-ready data through layout analysis and semantic chunking.

item.title: Koncile
item.description: Koncile is an AI-powered OCR platform that combines advanced recognition technology with large language models to extract and structure data from documents.

item.title: LandingAI
item.description: LandingAI is a visual AI company founded by Andrew Ng that provides computer vision and document intelligence solutions through its LandingLens and Agentic Document Extraction platforms.

item.title: Parsewise
item.description: Parsewise is an AI-powered platform that automates data extraction, resolution, and validation from document packages for investment and underwriting teams.

item.title: smartextract
item.description: smartextract is a document understanding platform by dida that uses AI and large language models for automated document processing tasks.

item.title: IDP Market Update: October 2025 Roundup
item.description: The intelligent document processing market entered October 2025 with clear momentum toward agentic AI capabilities, strategic partnerships driving vertical market specialization, and financial performance divergences that separated technology innovators from companies struggling to monetize AI investments.
